Change Log
----------

`1.0.0`_ (2016-09-09)
+++++++++++++++++++++

**Added**

- A board data structure
- An arbiter
- A game engine
- An AI based on the Minimax algorithm
- A CLI

0.0.1 (2016-09-05)
++++++++++++++++++

Birth!
